description:
A special day approaches during a lull in the chaos. It`s that time of year to give chocolate to the ones you love, but not everyone finds that an easy task.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kesshou Takei no Valentine`s: Bittersweet Intermedio
Valentine`s of Crystal Polymorphism: Bittersweet Intermedio
結晶多形のヴァレンティヌス Bittersweet Intermedio
